description: Change a parameter type in a function
oldCode: public function add(int x, int y){}
newCode: public function add(int x, String y){}

description: Change a parameter in a function
oldCode: public function add(int x, int y){}
newCode: public function add(int x , String z){}

description: Remove a parameter in a function
oldCode: public function add(int x, int y){}

description: Add a new parameter to the function
oldCode: public function add(int x, int y){}
newCode: public function add(int x , int y , int z ){}

description: Change the order of a parameter in function
oldCode: public function add(int x, int y){}
newCode: public function add(int y , int x ){}

description: Add a default value for a required parameter in function definition
oldCode: public function add(int x, int y){}
newCode: public function add( int x =  7 , int y){}

description: Change the default value parameter as a required parameter in function definition
oldCode: public function add(int x, int y){}
newCode: public function add(int x = 7 , int y ){}

description: Change the default value parameter to another default value in function definition
oldCode: public function add(int x, int y = 7 ){}
newCode: public function add(int x , int y){}

description: Change the order of required and default values parameters.
oldCode: public function add(int y = 7 , int x){}
newCode: public function add(int x , int y = 7){}

description: Add parameter annotation to a function.
Remove parameter annotation from a function.
Modify parameter annotation in a function.
